app.title: Markdown Printer
app.description: Upload a Markdown file or enter text directly to print

input.placeholder:
Enter Markdown text here...

Example:
# Heading
## Subheading
- List item 1
- List item 2

**Bold text** and *italic*

[Link](https://example.com)

messages.noPrintContent: No content to print. Please upload a Markdown file or enter text.
messages.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all content?
messages.noPreviewContent: No content to preview. Please upload a Markdown file or enter text.
messages.fileTypeError: Only Markdown files (.md, .markdown) or text files (.txt) are supported.
